Publications

Group highlights

(For a full list see below or go to Inspire, Google Scholar, or arXiv)

Schwinger effect in Compact Space

We consider a theory of scalar QED on a spatially compact 1+1-dimensional spacetime and uncover new results for Schwinger mechanism in compact space.

Prasant Samantray and Suprit Singh

arxiv:2010.13453

On the Penrose inequality in anti-deSitter space

We formulate Penrose inequality for asymptotically anti-deSitter (AAdS) spacetimes, and show that the inequality holds for time asymmetric data in spherical symmetry.

Viqar Husain and Suprit Singh

Phys. Rev. D 96, 104055 (2017)

Multifaceted Schwinger effect in de Sitter space

We consider Schwinger Mechanism in de Sitter space relavant for inflationary phase of early universe. The effect is enhanced in some regimes when electric field works in tandem with gravity on the quantum vacuum.

Ramkishor Sharma and Suprit Singh

Phys. Rev. D 96, 025012 (2017)

Featured in a Kaleidoscope Physical Review D.
